nodes.text: The DC-15A blaster rifle was the standard blaster rifle of the Republic clone troopers, elite soldiers of the Grand Army of the Republic. A variant of the DC-15 was later used by Purge Troopers of the Galactic Empire. A version with a wooden stock was the standard weapon of the Senate Commandos. It was a larger, heavier and more powerful long-range alternative to the DC-15A blaster carbine.
The blaster used replaceable tibanna gas cartridges for ammunition, and set on low power the blaster could fire up to five hundred shots of plasma bolts.
The DC-15LE was a variant of the DC-15 that could be modified for long-range engagements or to shoot explosive blaster bolts.
Another variant was the DC-15x sniper rifle, which could deal more damage, but contained fewer shots.
The DC-15 blaster rifle is based on the design of the German MG34 machine gun, which was used during World War II.
